code: import React,{useState}from'react';import API from'../api';import'../Styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReservationForm(_ref){let{roomId}=_ref;const[date,setDate]=useState('');const[startTime,setStartTime]=useState('');const[endTime,setEndTime]=useState('');const today=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(endTime<=startTime){alert("End time must be after start time.");return;}try{await API.post("reservations/",{room:roomId,date,start_time:startTime,end_time:endTime});alert("Reservation confirmed!");}catch(error){alert("Error submitting reservation.");console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Reserve a Room"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Please select a date and time to book your room."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",min:today,value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Start Time:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"start_time",value:startTime,onChange:e=>setStartTime(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"End Time:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"end_time",value:endTime,onChange:e=>setEndTime(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-green",children:"Confirm Booking"})]})]});}export default ReservationForm;
